releaseRules.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)
Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Github Actions, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
A code change that improves performance
A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
